item.description:
The world's most dangerous food scam... EXPOSED

Genetic Roulette: The Gamble of Our Lives.
A film by bestselling author Jeffery M. Smith. Narrated by Liza Oz.
How Genetically Engineered Foods Harm You and Your Family. This film features interviews with scientists, physicians, farmers, dieticians, chefs, and educators all discussing the problems with genetically engineered food.

This 85 minute award-winning film is being screened as part of the Rockville-Tolland Seventh-Day Adventist Church's Community Outreach Program.

Questions? Contact A. Varricchio (860) 944-9988 or visit rockvilletollandsda.org
item.name: "Genetic Roulette" Film Screening
